original_text: And he made the mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half was the length thereof, and one cubit and a half the breadth thereof.
korean_text: 순금으로 속죄소를 만들었으니 길이가 두 규빗 반, 너비가 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: And he made the mercy seat
two cubits and a half was the length thereof
and one cubit and a half the breadth thereof
sentences.korean_translation: 그 너비는 한 규빛 반 이었더라
